topics.body: what i never got about the civil war was, SHIELD already knows who they all are, why not just have some of their people run the damn thing so the heroes don't feel pressured? there was no reason to make it a thing people would fight over, just pass a new anti vigilante law and tell them "hey we will get in touch with you and get you a special license to engage in super heroing, strictly confidential, just a way to assure the people we can hold you accountable if you do something wrong,"  and boom no civil war,
